body: With further modification, your eyes see clearly in not only normal darkness, but in magical darkness as well.
name: Improved Dark Sight
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Fetchlings/New Racial Rules/Fetchling Feats/Improved Dark Sight

sections.body: You gain the see in darkness ability and lose the light sensitivity weakness, but gain the light blindness weakness.
sections.name: Benefit
